org.opendaylight.controller.networkconfig.neutron

Interface INeutronRouterCRUD

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NeutronRouterInterface

    public interface INeutronRouterCRUD
    This interface defines the methods for CRUD of NB Router objects

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addRouter(NeutronRouter input)
      Applications call this interface method to add a Router object to the concurrent map
